snippet: Former Mets Mookie Wilson and Darryl Strawberry said they believed the team could regain its standing if it could develop and stick to an organizational blueprint.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Baseball column notes that former New York Mets Mookie Wilson and Darryl Strawberry say they believe the Mets could regain their standing if they could develop and stick to an organizational blueprint.
lead_paragraph: Former Mets Mookie Wilson and Darryl Strawberry said they believed the team could regain its standing if it could develop and stick to an organizational blueprint.

headline.seo: For Mets, Whispers to Build From Within
headline.main: For Mets, Whispers to Build From Within
